title: Important Newcastle United dates to watch out for - Now ( 4 July 2024 ) updated
body_text:
Important Newcastle United dates to watch out for – Now (4 July 2024) updated
Some interesting dates ahead for Newcastle United fans.
As the seasons draws ever nearer, more information coming into the public domain.
Only 44 days until Newcastle United kick of their Premier League season.
Plenty happening ahead of that…
Upcoming dates for Newcastle United fans to note:
Sunday 30 June 2024 – The end of the latest NUFC financial year and latest three-year PSR period, where allowable losses can’t exceed £105m (some club expenditure doesn’t count towards PSR).
Early July 2024 – The Newcastle United first-team squad set to return to start pre-season preparations.
Early July 2024 – Release of 2024/25 Newcastle United away shirt/kit
Monday 1 July 2024 – Tickets go on sale for the friendly at Hull (27 July), initially season ticket holders with 60 loyalty points can buy them, an allocation of 4,500 tickets for NUFC fans.
Wednesday 3 July 2023 – Tickets go on sale to season ticket holders and members for the SJP Sela Weekend friendlies on 9 and 10 August
Friday 5 July 2024 – The Premier League has pledged to reveal details of all August and September live TV matches by this date at the very latest.
Saturday 6 July 2024 – England (Kieran Trippier and Anthony Gordon) v Switzerland (Fabian Schar) for a place in the 2024 Euros semis – 5 pm kick-off
Saturday 6 July 2024 – Brazil (Bruno Guimaraes) v Uruguay for a place in the 2024 Copa America semis (Sunday early hours 2 am kick-off in UK time)
Sunday 14 July 2024 – European Championships final.
Sunday 14 July 2024 – Copa America final.
Mid/later July 2024 – Sky Sports report that Newcastle United will spend a week doing pre-season training in Germany (before Hull and Japan friendlies), still awaiting official confirmation of this, as well as news of any match(es) whilst the squad is over there
Saturday 27 July 2024 – Hull City v Newcastle United friendly, 2pm kick-off.
Wednesday 31 July 2024 – Urawa Red Diamonds v Newcastle United friendly in Japan, playing at the 62,000 capacity Saitama Stadium, the largest football-specific stadium in Japan.
Early August 2024 – Release of 2024/25 Newcastle United third shirt / kit
Saturday 3 August 2024 – Yokohama F Marinos v Newcastle United friendly at the National Stadium in Toyko.
Friday 9 August 2024 – Newcastle United v Girona FC friendly 7.30pm kick-off (SJP Sela weekend)
Saturday 10 August 2024 – Newcastle United Women v TBC 1pm kick-off (SJP Sela weekend)
Saturday 10 August 2024 – Newcastle United v Stade Brestois 4pm kick-off (SJP Sela weekend)
Saturday 17 August 2024 – Newcastle v Southampton (3pm kick-off) kicks NUFC Premier League season off
Friday 30 August 2024 – Summer transfer window closes at 11pm.
Wednesday 1 January 2025 – Winter transfer window opens.
Monday 3 February 2025 – Winter transfer window closes at 11pm.
Sunday 25 May 2025 – The final round of 2024/25 Premier League fixtures will be played.
